PHRASE.LANG:
A costume set of an apprentice sorceress who defends her kingdom.

This set contains the following items:

[Sorceress Defenders Hat (Purple)] (Head accessory)
[Sorceress Defenders Dress (Purple)] (Outfit)
[Sorceress Defenders boots (Purple)] (Shoes)

Items are added to each category after purchase. [#Legal]

items sont ajoutés à chaque catégorie après l'achat. [#Legal]
